description:
Engineering start up is an area of interest to science and engineering students and the Government is also actively supporting this process. Business compliance requirement in India is very high. So it poses difficulty to the young entrepreneurs as to how and what form of business organization to choose for their start-up. This course is aimed at educating the students in that direction.

                                            Syllabus
                        Week 1: Fundamentals of choosing the Business Organization form for startupWeek 2: Laws relating to incorporation of Partnership, LL.P & Co - operativeWeek 3: Laws relating to incorporation of One Person Company, Pvt. Ltd., Pub. Ltd. and not for profit companyWeek 4: Financing the venture and legal compliance
title: Legal Compliance for Incorporating Startup
